text: Can't Help Singing is a 1944 American western musical movie directed by Frank Ryan and was based on the story by John D. Klorer and Leo Townsend. It stars Deanna Durbin, Robert Paige, Akim Tamiroff, Leonid Kinskey, June Vincent, Andrew Tombes, Thomas Gomez and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1946. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1944 musical movies Category:1940s Western (genre) movies Category:American musical movies Category:American Western (genre) movies
title: Can't Help Singing
